rules_text: Once each turn during each of your turns, you may cast a permanent card from your graveyard by provisioning in addition to paying that card's mana cost. It enters with a finality counter on it. [i](To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Sigrid was horrified. Her gift to Arietta, stolen and used here as a tool of slaughter. Was this her reward for kindness? The eternal burden of these lost souls?[/i]
